changes.reasoning: Add tab navigation system to PR viewer. Replaced the collapsible 'Files changed' section with a tab-based interface. Added state management for active tab ('changes' or 'files') and created a clean tab switcher with blue highlighting for the active tab.

Create Files Changed tab with plain diff view. Added a new tab that shows all files with complete diffs in a simple file-based organization, without any reasoning markup. This provides an alternative view for users who want to see the traditional file-by-file diff layout.
